item.title: Dedicated Server
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

skullman25:

Can any one reconmend a good dedicated server company, that allows you to install programs?

i got some advice for you browse www.webhostingtalk.com they are the largest web host forums around, and they will be happy to help you with any questions/worries you might have. And can i ask what you might need it for? because you might want to check out the vps area, and see if that is right for you. If not look for dedicated, And if you find a site check there testimonials see if they have good rating with there customers and search on wht (webhostingtalk) about them, next check there support system. If you email them and they respond under 1 hour that is great if it is under 30 minuted that is considered excellent. Next once your happy with your choice wait about 1-3 months and give us a review you could also try uk2.net they would be my second choice in dedicated server, but my first choice would be www.leveltec.co.uk ,i have seen there plans and they look pretty nice

Read full topic
